Parameters: byte: the buffer with the IV. The first len bytes of the buffer beginning at offset inclusive are copied to protect against subsequent modification.
int: the offset in iv where the IV starts.
int: the number of IV bytes.
Throws: if iv is null or (iv.length - offset < len)
is thrown if offset or len index bytes outside the iv.
IvParameterSpec(byte[],int,int).Description: Creates an IvParameterSpec object using the first len bytes in iv, beginning at offset inclusive, as the IV. The bytes that constitute the IV are those between iv[offset] and iv[offset+len-1] inclusive.
IvParameterSpec(byte[],int,int).FullName: public IvParameterSpec (byte[] iv, int offset, int len)

Parameters: byte: the buffer with the IV. The first len bytes of the buffer beginning at offset inclusive are copied to protect against subsequent modification.
int: the offset in iv where the IV starts.
int: the number of IV bytes.
Throws: if iv is null or (iv.length - offset < len)
is thrown if offset or len index bytes outside the iv.
IvParameterSpec(byte[], int, int).Description: Creates an IvParameterSpec object using the first len bytes in iv, beginning at offset inclusive, as the IV. The bytes that constitute the IV are those between iv[offset] and iv[offset+len-1] inclusive.
IvParameterSpec(byte[], int, int).FullName: public IvParameterSpec (byte[] iv, int offset, int len)

Returns: the initialization vector (IV). Returns a new array each time this method is called.

Parameters: byte: the buffer with the IV. The contents of the buffer are copied to protect against subsequent modification.
IvParameterSpec(byte[]).Description: Creates an IvParameterSpec object using the bytes in iv as the IV.
